content.title: Mapping the UI Elements to the Service
content.body:
• From the left pane of the Mapping Editor, expand Forms > frmEditRecipients.
    From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, expand Services > Service-RecipientStorage$Recipients$update.
  • From the left pane of the Mapping Editor, expand TextField - tbxPayeeID and select text{string}.
    From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, RecipientID{number}.
  • From the left pane of the Mapping Editor, expand TextField - tbxFirstName and select text{string}.
    From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, FirstName{string}.
